output_list.description: The transfer function does not check for integer overflow when adding the transferred amount to the recipient's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance and potentially loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check for integer overflow when adding the transferred amount to the recipient's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance and potentially loss of funds.

The buy function does not check for integer overflow when calculating the amount of tokens to be purchased based on the received Ether. This can lead to an incorrect balance and potentially loss of funds.
The sell function does not check for integer overflow when calculating the amount of Ether to be sent based on the sold tokens. This can lead to an incorrect balance and potentially loss of funds.
The mintToken function does not check for integer overflow when adding the minted amount to the recipient's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance and potentially loss of funds.
